summary: this replaces the main theme, the boss battle music, and some explore music files. the explore replacers are mellow tracks and the rest is metal, black pagan metal, i warned you. not bad for punching a dragon in the face.
descriptionHtml:
preview

carved into pale twighlight
[youtube]2mFrEzsDBdk[/youtube]
where the oak and skyline meet
[youtube]b4P_7IJyt7s[/youtube]
the seidkona oracle
[youtube]aLtFXVesuqY[/youtube]
into the berserker frey
[youtube]07tybN8wh90[/youtube]
worth a look
[youtube]HtvMgIsAEho[/youtube]

installation

just take the music folder and drop in your skyrim data folder, job done.
inside the music folder are three other folders special(main theme), combat(boss battles), and explore(as name implies). you could always pick and choose just delete appropriate folder.

removal

refer to zip file for file names and delete those files from music folder.

not a problem

i have permission to make and upload this mod per Archaic Eclipse.
please enjoy.
author: rigormortician
